desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cn对策委员会}学生们跟踪{cf茜香}，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是{cf茜香}依然一副没好气的样子。{cf茜香}在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_cn: 老师撞见了{cf茜香}，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。{cf茜香}躲闪着，但老师{cf步}{cf步}紧跟；{cf茜香}后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
举例/联想：Aoharu
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_cn: 老师带着{cn对策委员会}的其它人来到了{cf茜香}打工的拉面店，{cf茜香}大为震撼。然后，{cf茜香}带领大家就坐；之后，{cf野乃美}主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在{cf茜香}的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.jp: The regular meeting for Abydos Foreclosure Task Force begins, as everyone purposes their own way to pay the debt.
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯{cn对策委员会}的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。

desc.en: Serika finds an ad promoting a bracelet that will make everyone luckier. But it is soon discovered to be a Pyramid Scheme by others.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_cn: 众人决定带{cf绫音}去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了{cn便利屋68}全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，{cn便利屋68}只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。{cf亚瑠}跟{cn对策委员会}交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是{sn阿拜多斯}的人。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而{cf遥香}却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.zh_cn: 拉面店老板错认{cn便利屋68}为{sn阿拜多斯}的朋友，{cf亚瑠}突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。{cf遥香}尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为前往{sn阿拜多斯}的便利屋送行。另一方面，{cf绫音}和{cf茜香}一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.jp: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.zh_cn: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与{cn风纪委员会}的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。{cf亚瑠}表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示{cf亚瑠}真是令人操心。
【暂无】

desc.en: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.

desc.zh_cn: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。{cf亚瑠}表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回{sn阿拜多斯}看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着{cn便利屋68}东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.jp: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}和{cf茜香}前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，{sn阿拜多斯}土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。
【暂无】

desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往{sn格黑娜}学园和{sn三一}学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的{cf阳奈}和格黑娜{cn风纪委员会}一行人，助{sn阿拜多斯}{cn对策委员会}一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.jp: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 老师来到{sn格黑娜}，希望见到{cf阳奈}，但被{cf伊织}拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。{cf伊织}对老师破口大骂，正好遇到{cf阳奈}。{cf阳奈}见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而{cf伊织}不知为何提到了舔脚的事，{cf阳奈}大受震撼。

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.jp: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到{cn便利屋68}四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，{cf佳世子}对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，{cf亚瑠}表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.en: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.jp: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.zh_cn: 所有事件结束后，老师收到{cf绫音}寄来的信。{cf绫音}向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住{cn对策委员会}的日常。

desc.en: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.jp: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.zh_cn: 由于老师的帮助，{cn对策委员会}现在被正式认定为学校的社团，承担{sn阿拜多斯}学生会的职务，不过学生会长是谁尚未决定。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
BG_FoodCartRamen.jpg Description

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.jp: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

desc.en: 對策委員會在柴大將的店裡吃拉麵，茜香有些難堪。談到價錢，老闆主動表示這一頓免費，並讓茜香先歇一會。星野故意重提許久以前的“坐白子還是野乃美旁邊”這一問題，而惱火的茜香直接坐到了星野大腿上。星野隨後被眾人擠著。
desc.jp: 對策委員會在柴大將的店裡吃拉麵，茜香有些難堪。談到價錢，老闆主動表示這一頓免費，並讓茜香先歇一會。星野故意重提許久以前的“坐白子還是野乃美旁邊”這一問題，而惱火的茜香直接坐到了星野大腿上。星野隨後被眾人擠著。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}在柴大将的店里吃拉面，{cf茜香}有些难堪。谈到价钱，老板主动表示这一顿免费，并让{cf茜香}先歇一会。{cf星野}故意重提许久以前的“坐{cf白子}还是{cf野乃美}旁边”这一问题，而恼火的{cf茜香}直接坐到了{cf星野}大腿上。{cf星野}随后被众人挤着。

desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
BG_FoodCartRamen.jpg Description

desc.en: 彩奈歡迎星奈入住自己的箱子，星奈表示了感謝。雖然作為後輩，彩奈還是讓星奈說出了那句“我回來了”的臺詞。
desc.jp: 彩奈歡迎星奈入住自己的箱子，星奈表示了感謝。雖然作為後輩，彩奈還是讓星奈說出了那句“我回來了”的臺詞。
desc.zh_cn: {cf彩奈}欢迎星奈入住自己的箱子，星奈表示了感谢。虽然作为后辈，{cf彩奈}还是让星奈说出了那句“我回来了”的台词。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。
BG_AronaRoom.jpg Description
BG_CS_S1Final_84.jpg Description

desc.en: 琳向步和桃香表示感謝，感謝他們信任並願意跟隨著她。步提及了琳被撤職一事，而琳則表示這事還是不要步插手好一些。在走之前，步提到在琳的桌面上似乎有一封給她的信。
desc.jp: 琳向步和桃香表示感謝，感謝他們信任並願意跟隨著她。步提及了琳被撤職一事，而琳則表示這事還是不要步插手好一些。在走之前，步提到在琳的桌面上似乎有一封給她的信。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}向{cf步}和{cf桃香}表示感谢，感谢他们信任并愿意跟随着她。{cf步}提及了{cf琳}被撤职一事，而{cf琳}则表示这事还是不要{cf步}插手好一些。在走之前，{cf步}提到在{cf琳}的桌面上似乎有一封给她的信。

desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
BG_ReceptionRoom.jpg Description

desc.en: 百鬼夜行的陰陽部部長仁也聯絡上了老師，詢問老師近況如何，並追問了有關老師全身赤裸在田野上奔跑一事，老師不予置評。回到正題，仁也提到忍術研究部的各位已經回去，見到了自稱為百花繚亂的副部長。她提到他們帶回了一封據稱是來自部長葛葉的信，要專門給老師看。
desc.jp: 百鬼夜行的陰陽部部長仁也聯絡上了老師，詢問老師近況如何，並追問了有關老師全身赤裸在田野上奔跑一事，老師不予置評。回到正題，仁也提到忍術研究部的各位已經回去，見到了自稱為百花繚亂的副部長。她提到他們帶回了一封據稱是來自部長葛葉的信，要專門給老師看。
desc.zh_cn: {sn百鬼夜行}的{cn阴阳部}部长仁也联系上了老师，询问老师近况如何，并追问了有关老师全身赤裸在田野上奔跑一事，老师不予置评。回到正题，仁也提到{cn忍术研究部}的各位已经回去，见到了自称为百花缭乱的副部长。她提到他们带回了一封据称是来自部长{cf葛业}的信，要专门给老师看。

BG_MainOffice.jpg Description

desc.en: 葛葉在信件中提到，被色彩侵蝕之人是無法逆轉回去的。如果要了解更多的話，就去百鬼夜行區親自見見她。
desc.jp: 葛葉在信件中提到，被色彩侵蝕之人是無法逆轉回去的。如果要了解更多的話，就去百鬼夜行區親自見見她。
desc.zh_cn: {cf葛业}在信件中提到，被色彩侵蚀之人是无法逆转回去的。如果要了解更多的话，就去{sn百鬼夜行}区亲自见见她。

desc.en: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.jp: Kuzunoha is a prophet from Hyakkaryouran Conflict Resolution Council club, who possesses a similar ability with Seia. In the Volume Final, Kuzunoha helped Seia deprive her ability in order to for her to stay safe during the coming incident. She left a message to Sensei stating that there's no cure for Chroma-eroded person and invited Sensei to come to visit her for more details.
desc.zh_cn: 葛业是来自百花缭乱冲突解决委员会的一名先知，其能力与圣亚类似。在终篇中，葛业帮助圣亚剥夺了后者的能力，以便使其在接下来发生的事件中保持安全。她给老师留下了一条消息，其中声称没有能将色彩侵蚀之人复原的方法，并邀请老师当面与她聊聊。

desc.en: 琳回到自己的辦公室，見到了桌面上的信件。信上沒有寫寄出人，但琳根據信的筆跡認出，這似乎是一封來自聯邦學生會會長的信。
desc.jp: 琳回到自己的辦公室，見到了桌面上的信件。信上沒有寫寄出人，但琳根據信的筆跡認出，這似乎是一封來自聯邦學生會會長的信。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}回到自己的办公室，见到了桌面上的信件。信上没有写寄出人，但{cf琳}根据信的笔迹认出，这似乎是一封来自联邦学生会会长的信。

desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.

BG_CS_PV4_164.jpg Description

desc.en: 最終，彩奈與星奈在箱子的教室裡會合。星奈坐在一張課桌前，而彩奈則在一邊看著她。本篇故事以此次會合結束。在單擊此頁面後，遊戲將會重啟到主選單，允許玩家重新登入時觀看新的載入動畫。【注意：這是每個賬號都只有一次的機會，重新播放故事並不會觸發這一行為。】
desc.jp: 最終，彩奈與星奈在箱子的教室裡會合。星奈坐在一張課桌前，而彩奈則在一邊看著她。本篇故事以此次會合結束。在單擊此頁面後，遊戲將會重啟到主選單，允許玩家重新登入時觀看新的載入動畫。【注意：這是每個賬號都只有一次的機會，重新播放故事並不會觸發這一行為。】
desc.zh_cn: 最终，{cf彩奈}与星奈在箱子的教室里会合。星奈坐在一张课桌前，而{cf彩奈}则在一边看着她。本篇故事以此次会合结束。在单击此页面后，游戏将会重启到主菜单，允许玩家重新登录时观看新的加载动画。【注意：这是每个账号都只有一次的机会，重新播放故事并不会触发这一行为。】
【暂无】

In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
